translation.en: Dog? Where's the dog? [girl] Over there.
translation.it: - Un dalmata? Dove l'hai visto? - Laggiù.

translation.en: What kind of dog was it?
Yeah. What, did you miss it?
Hey, sweetie. Don't pick at your scab. Come on.
translation.it: Ehi, tesoro. Non stuzzicarti la crosta. Dai.

translation.en: I was just checking. Did you make that hole?
translation.it: - La stavo controllando. - Li hai bucati tu?

translation.en: I wouldn't even have a scab if Lily Stevens didn't push me.
translation.it: Non avrei la crosta, se Lily Stevens non mi avesse spinta.

translation.en: Lily Stevens wouldn't have pushed you if you hadn't thrown chalk at her.
translation.it: Lei non ti avrebbe spinta se tu non le avessi lanciato il gesso.

translation.en: She was making faces at me.
Not ever. She deserved to be hurt.
Clara, no one deserves to be hurt, no one.
translation.it: Clara, nessuno merita di essere ferito. Nessuno.

translation.en: [radio host] I got to meet TJ. He's a nice, nice gentleman.
translation.it: Ho conosciuto TJ. È un vero gentiluomo. Andate a trovarlo e ordinate dei waffle.

translation.en: Please go in to TJ's and get yourselves some waffles there.
translation.it: È un vero gentiluomo. Andate a trovarlo e ordinate dei waffle.

translation.en: So that is on the list, and I'm gonna put it down as number two
translation.it: È sulla lista. Lo metterò al secondo posto.

translation.en: [Tony Robbins on podcast] We grow or we die.
So, we're unaware that we use events as a trigger
translation.it: Non ci rendiamo conto di usare certi avvenimenti come scusa

translation.en: to get home back to the patterns we know
translation.it: Non ci rendiamo conto di usare certi avvenimenti come scusa per ripetere schemi a noi familiari, anche se sgradevoli.
per ripetere schemi a noi familiari, anche se sgradevoli.

translation.en: So, if you identify where you live, emotionally, the patterns that are limiting you,
translation.it: Chi è conscio della propria emotività è limitato da questi schemi.

translation.en: -the second piece is find the antidote. -[phone dings]
multiple times in our life, extreme stress.
The difference in peoples' lives is not what we face,
it's what we do with what we face.
Life gives us these events, these, quote, "horrific events,"
translation.it: La vita ci pone di fronte ad "avvenimenti terribili"

translation.en: because there's an area of our life that has to grow.
You can take yourself from a place
where in the face of absolute total tragedy,
translation.it: di fronte a una tragedia immane...

translation.en: [woman] You know, Poppy taught me how to change a tire.
translation.it: È stata Poppy a insegnarmi a cambiare le gomme.
Un giorno lo insegnerò a te.

translation.en: In the meantime, you should probably come over here and...
translation.it: Nel frattempo, sarebbe meglio che venissi qui,

translation.en: get a head start and pay attention.
Maybe you can help by getting Mommy her coffee.
translation.it: Magari puoi dare una mano portando un caffè alla mamma.

translation.en: [Clara] When we get to Oklahoma, can we...

translation.it: - Fa' vedere! - Mamma, mi ha morso!

translation.en: Oh, God. Okay. It's okay, sweetie.

translation.it: Forza. Va tutto bene. Clara? Clara. Forza, piccola.

translation.en: Come on, stay with me, baby, okay?
translation.it: Forza. Resta con me, amore, ok?

translation.en: Just stay with me, baby. Stay with me.
Oh, God. Come on, come on.
I'm so sorry for barging in.
My little girl, she got bitten by a snake,
translation.it: Mia figlia è stata morsa da un serpente.

translation.en: and I really need your help.
I got a flat tire, and I can't get a signal.
translation.it: Ho una gomma a terra e non c'è campo.

translation.en: She's really burning up. I don't know what to do.
translation.it: Ha la febbre alta. Non so cosa fare.

translation.en: I've worked on many a bite out here. Let me help her.
translation.it: Ho guarito molti morsi di serpente. L'aiuto io.

translation.en: -Oh, she's going blue. She's going blue! -Here, let me.
translation.it: - È cianotica. - Dalla a me. È cianotica! La prego, la aiuti!
È cianotica! La prego, la aiuti!

translation.en: What can you do? The nearest town's Tulia.
translation.it: - Cosa può fare? - La città più vicina è Tulia.

translation.en: You best get that tire sorted out.
Come on, don't just stand there, honey. Time's a-wasting.
translation.it: Dai, non startene lì impalata. Il tempo stringe.

translation.en: [man] We'll keep her in for the day, monitor her condition,
translation.it: Per oggi, la terremo in osservazione.

translation.en: but trust me, if a five-year-old was bitten by a rattlesnake... [chuckles] you'd know it.
translation.it: Se un serpente a sonagli l'avesse morsa, se ne sarebbe accorta.

translation.en: From the looks, it's just exhaustion, mild dehydration.
translation.it: Sembra un colpo di calore, una lieve disidratazione.

translation.en: You should've seen her. She was burning up, she wasn't breathing.
translation.it: Avrebbe dovuto vederla. Aveva la febbre, non respirava.

translation.en: She turned blue, for Christ sakes.
[doctor] Were you feeling out of sorts at all during the drive?
translation.it: Non si è sentita bene mentre guidava?

translation.en: -[doctor] Medication? You taking anything? -[woman] Nothing, no.
Listen, Phoenix to Oklahoma can be a long haul.
translation.it: Da Phoenix all'Oklahoma è un bel viaggio.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm not a very good flier, so driving was the lesser of two evils.
translation.it: Non prendo volentieri l'aereo. L'auto era il male minore.
...in apprensione o sotto stress prima della partenza?

translation.en: We're starting over, and the move's been a lot on Clara.
translation.it: Abbiamo iniziato una nuova vita. Clara non l'ha presa bene.

translation.en: [doctor] Slightly elevated. Not surprising, but nothing alarming.
translation.it: È un po' alta. Non mi sorprende, ma non è preoccupante.

translation.en: Look, I know this sounds crazy.
translation.it: Senta, so che sembra una follia.

translation.en: But there has to be some kind of explanation.
I mean, that old woman, maybe she had...
I don't know, like an ancient remedy on her shelf or something.
translation.it: un qualche antico rimedio a disposizione.

translation.en: I'm just... I'm just telling you what happened.
translation.it: Le sto solo raccontando quello che è successo.

translation.en: [doctor] Your daughter's gonna be fine. She just needs to rest.
translation.it: Sua figlia starà bene. Le serve solo un po' di riposo.

translation.en: You need to do the same.
[man] That's all it is. God's will.
To think we almost lost her.
You really are lucky. Things could have ended much differently.
translation.it: È davvero fortunata. Poteva finire diversamente.

translation.en: I'm here to talk about your payment, Ms. Ridgeway.
translation.it: Devo parlarle del pagamento, sig. ra Ridgeway.

translation.en: Why don't you pull up a chair?
So, we have insurance, my daughter and I, both.
translation.it: Sia io che mia figlia abbiamo l'assicurazione.

translation.en: Oh, I'm not talking about your hospital debt.
translation.it: Non mi riferisco al debito che ha con l'ospedale.

translation.en: I'm talking about the other debt.
What was done for your daughter doesn't come cheap.
translation.it: Averla guarita ha un prezzo molto alto.

translation.en: And now you owe one in return.
translation.it: E ora lei ne deve un'altra.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I thought you said soul.
Ms. Ridgeway, you don't have long to pay your debt.
translation.it: Non le resta molto tempo per saldare il suo debito.

translation.en: You only have until sunset, which is...
translation.it: Ha solo fino al tramonto, che sarà...

translation.en: The soul you take can be any one of your choosing,
translation.it: Sarà lei a scegliere l'anima da reclamare.

translation.en: And it must be paid in full and on time.
translation.it: E il debito deve essere saldato per intero e in tempo.

translation.en: don't really understand what's going on.
I don't know who you are. I think I'm gonna call security.
translation.it: Non so chi lei sia. Chiamerò la sicurezza.

translation.en: I would like you to leave the room, leave my daughter alone.
translation.it: Se ne vada e lasci in pace mia figlia.

translation.en: Failure to meet your debt, Ms. Ridgeway,
will result in your daughter's condition returning to what it was.
translation.it: le condizioni di sua figlia torneranno quelle di prima.

translation.en: I'd like you to leave now.
Let me, uh, remind you of what that'd look like.
translation.it: Lasci... che le ricordi quali fossero.

translation.en: ...before she succumbs to the snake venom...
translation.it: ...prima di soccombere al veleno del serpente,

translation.en: working its way through her tiny body.
translation.it: che si fa strada nel suo corpicino.

translation.en: She will die, Ms. Ridgeway, that I can assure you.
Make it stop! Fucking get out of here! Get out!
translation.it: La aiuti! Poi se ne vada! Esca!

translation.en: Help! Someone come in here, now!
You best get a move on.
Okay, I need you to call-- -[female nurse] Did something happen here? -[alarm stops]
-Who do you want us to call? -Miss?
-[male nurse] Should I call security? -No, no, no, no! No, don't.
translation.it: Chiamo la sicurezza? No! Non è necessario.

translation.en: [woman] I've been up since before dawn, driving.
translation.it: Mi sono messa in viaggio prima dell'alba.

translation.en: Maybe I need to check into the motel across the road.
translation.it: Prenderò una stanza nel motel qui di fronte.

translation.en: [female nurse] That's probably for the best. We'll keep an eye on her for you.
translation.it: Buona idea. Penseremo noi alla piccola.

translation.en: [woman] Okay, I'll just say goodbye to her.
[cries] I don't know what's going on, Clara.
translation.it: Non so cosa stia succedendo, Clara.

translation.en: I just want you to be okay.
translation.it: Voglio solo che tu stia bene.

translation.en: I'm fine, I don't need any help!
translation.it: Sto bene. Non mi serve aiuto!

translation.en: Only one way to save her! Stay away from me.
translation.it: - C'è solo un modo per salvarla! - Stammi lontano.

translation.en: [news reporter] This is the diner in Tulia, Texas
translation.it: Questo è il ristorante di Tulia

translation.en: where 47-year-old lawyer Donald Covington was fatally stabbed in the chest
translation.it: dove l'avvocato Donald Covington, 47 anni, è stato pugnalato a morte

translation.en: by 32-year-old school teacher Michael James Warner just before sunset.
translation.it: da un insegnante di 32 anni, Michael James Warner, poco prima del tramonto.

translation.en: Witnesses say Warner kept repeating, in a bizarre manner,
translation.it: Secondo i testimoni, Warner ha ripetuto l'insolita frase

translation.en: "A soul for a soul," as he attacked Covington.
[Katrina] "The difference is not what we face,
it's what we choose to do when we face it." "The difference is not what we face,
translation.it: Importa come lo affrontiamo. Non importa cosa affrontiamo.

translation.en: it's what we choose to do when we face it."
That... that was so nosy of me.
I shouldn't have just been peering into your room like that.
translation.it: Non avrei dovuto sbirciare nella tua stanza.

translation.en: No, I just wanted to offer my condolences.
translation.it: Volevo solo porgerti le mie condoglianze.

translation.en: Oh, no. Uh... Of course not.
Such a... [clears throat] Such a strange thing...
waiting for your daddy to die.
Anyway, I'm sorry. What brings you here?
translation.it: In ogni caso... Mi dispiace. Cosa ti porta qui?
Mia figlia ha avuto un colpo di calore.

translation.en: We've been driving all day, and... she's not feeling too well.
translation.it: Abbiamo guidato tutto il giorno e... non si sentiva molto bene.

translation.en: [woman] How's she doing? She's fine. Um...
Doctor thinks she just needs some rest.
translation.it: Il dottore pensa che abbia solo bisogno di riposo.

translation.en: Anyway, um, it was nice chatting with you.
translation.it: Mi ha fatto piacere chiacchierare con te.

translation.en: I hope you and your little one get out of here soon.
translation.it: Spero che tua figlia venga dimessa presto.

translation.en: Well, uh, actually she's out for the count right now
and I am going stir-crazy in that silence all by myself.
translation.it: E stare da sola in silenzio mi sta facendo impazzire.

translation.en: So I was wondering if maybe, uh, I could...
The nurse described it kind of like a...
Or was it a one-way mirror?
Either way, he won't be waking up.
translation.it: In ogni caso, non si sveglierà.

translation.en: He seems to be at peace.
B-7. No, it's at the, um...
All right, just wait there, I'm coming.
Leave it to my sister to get lost in a hospital this small.
translation.it: Mia sorella riesce a perdersi persino qui.

translation.en: [whispers] I have to do this, I have to do this.
I have to do this, I have to do this, I have to do this, I have to do this.
I was just using the, um, bathroom.
-Wh... What the hell happened? -Stay away from me.
Hey, you don't... You don't look all right.
translation.it: Ehi... non la vedo in forma.

translation.en: Look, you want me to call someone?
What, you gonna put this down to another roller derby injury, huh?
translation.it: Darai la colpa al roller derby anche stavolta?

translation.en: It's a heck of a sport you chose there. Just give me a beer, Francine.
translation.it: - Hai scelto un bello sport. - Dammi solo una birra, Francine.

translation.en: is doing the same thing and expecting a different result.
translation.it: è ripetere la stessa azione aspettandosi risultati diversi.

translation.en: Let me stay, please, just a little while.
Get up off that stool, Abbie. [Francine] Billy, just let her finish her damn beer.
translation.it: - Alzati, Abbie. - Billy, lasciale finire la birra.

translation.en: This don't concern you, Francine, unless, of course, you want it to.
translation.it: Non ti riguarda, Francine. A meno che tu non lo voglia.

translation.en: [Francine] Can't have y'all getting into it here.
Apologize to Francine for coming in here and making a scene,
translation.it: Chiedi scusa a Francine per aver fatto una scenata

translation.en: Just get out of here, both of y'all.
Place has gone to shit anyways.
translation.it: Questo posto è comunque una topaia.
Sì. Sono il meglio di Tulia.

translation.en: Only a matter of time before she ends up in the obituaries.
translation.it: Prima o poi lei finirà nei necrologi.

translation.en: Some people are just beyond help.
[Billy] Why you always gotta make a scene?
Get in the truck! I'm not standing here in the goddamn street!
translation.it: Forza. Non te ne starai qui in mezzo alla strada!

translation.en: [man] Well, go on. It ain't gonna bite you.
Shoots a maximum of 16 rounds through a flush-fitted magazine.
translation.it: Spara un massimo di 16 colpi con un caricatore orizzontale.

translation.en: I'll do you two boxes for the price of one.
translation.it: Le do due scatole al prezzo di una.

translation.en: You ever, uh, fire one of those, darlin'? I'll take it.
translation.it: - Ne ha mai usata una? - La prendo.

translation.en: I'm just gonna need to see your license. You're a Texas resident, I take it.
translation.it: Basta che mi mostri la patente. È residente in Texas, immagino.

translation.en: Well, I'm afraid I can't be letting you purchase a firearm.
translation.it: Allora... temo di non poterle vendere un'arma da fuoco.

translation.en: my daughter and I, we were, uh...
translation.it: io e mia figlia siamo state...

translation.en: I feel like I need protection.
translation.it: Mi serve protezione. Mi dica cosa può fare.

translation.en: And I don't know what you can do, but maybe you could just...
translation.it: Mi serve protezione. Mi dica cosa può fare. Magari potrebbe... chiudere un occhio o...

translation.en: just turn a blind eye, or... I don't...
translation.it: Magari potrebbe... chiudere un occhio o...

translation.en: When did it get to be like this?
When did the open roads of this great country of ours revert to such savagery?
translation.it: Quando una tale barbarie ha lordato le strade di questo grande Paese?

translation.en: It's not right, not one bit.
translation.it: Non è giusto. Neanche un po'.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I can't help you, but...
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Io non posso aiutarla, ma...

translation.en: His name's Charlie. Lives here in Tulia. You can find him here.
translation.it: Si chiama Charlie. Vive qui a Tulia. Può trovarlo qui.

translation.en: I guess you'd call him a private dealer.

translation.it: Salve. Earl... mi ha mandata qui. Garantisce lui per me. Lei è Charlie?

translation.en: He said he'd vouch for me. Are you Charlie?
translation.it: mi ha mandata qui. Garantisce lui per me. Lei è Charlie?

translation.en: I'm gonna have to do a quick body check.
-You want me to fix you up some tea? -No, thank you.
translation.it: Le va un tè? No, grazie.

translation.en: More of a coffee drinker, huh?
My wife, Tracy, she'd stock the cupboard
translation.it: Mia moglie, Tracy, aveva la credenza

translation.en: full of a whole variety of exotic flavors.
-So, can we-- -You sure you don't wanna try some?

translation.it: - Non è un problema. - Sono sicura.

translation.en: Tracy is no longer with us.
She took the barrel of a Glock, identical to the one that you're buying...
translation.it: Ha preso la canna di una Glock, come quella che sta comprando lei...

translation.en: and put it in her mouth.
translation.it: e se l'è infilata in bocca.

translation.en: so sorry to hear about your wife, but I've gotta get going.
translation.it: Mi dispiace per sua moglie, ma ora devo andare.

translation.en: I mean, I can rustle up the other ten, but I've gotta go.
translation.it: Posso racimolare gli altri dieci, ma devo proprio andare.

translation.en: [sighs] I ain't gonna deprive a woman of carrying a piece.
translation.it: Non priverò una donna di una pistola.

translation.en: Now, what kind of a man would I be?
You ever handle one of them before?
translation.it: Ne ha mai usata una prima?

translation.en: Who's the unlucky son of a bitch? What?
translation.it: - Chi è lo sfortunato figlio di puttana? - Cosa?

translation.en: You out to end someone. I can see it in your eyes, plain as day.
translation.it: Vuole uccidere qualcuno. Glielo leggo negli occhi.

translation.en: [man over video] Hi, it's me again, Mr. Glock.
translation.it: Ciao, sono di nuovo io, il sig. Glock.

translation.en: Uh, I thought today, uh, one of the Glocks I've not demonstrated
translation.it: Oggi vi ho portato una delle Glock di cui non vi avevo mai parlato:

translation.en: or talked about, is the good old reliable Glock 19.
translation.it: Oggi vi ho portato una delle Glock di cui non vi avevo mai parlato: la vecchia e affidabile Glock 19.

translation.en: It's a magazine full of bullets in it,
and it also has one in the chamber.
translation.it: e che c'è un proiettile nella camera.

translation.en: Shit. The towels are all wet.
[Abbie] Oh, I put them in before work. They're in the drier.
[Billy] Can't have my girl drying off with no wet towel.
translation.it: Non puoi usare un asciugamano bagnato.

translation.en: You haven't finished your punishment yet.
translation.it: non hai completato la tua punizione.

translation.en: [Abbie] I'm not feeling so good. Maybe we can rain check?
translation.it: Non mi sento bene. Possiamo farlo un'altra volta?

translation.en: You already made a fool of me once today.
translation.it: Mi hai già preso in giro una volta, oggi.
- Senza ordine, cosa siamo? - Va bene.
- Senza ordine, cosa siamo? - Va bene. - Ok. - Cosa saremmo?

translation.en: You don't wanna be an animal.
translation.it: Tu non vuoi essere un animale.

translation.en: Half-hour should do it. Come on.
but Williams was able to score.
The fuck you doing? Get your stupid ass back up there!
translation.it: Che cazzo stai facendo? Torna di là, cretina!

translation.en: Okay. You stay there. Don't move, okay?
translation.it: Ok. Resta lì. Non ti muovere, ok?

translation.en: -If you want the truck-- -Just get up!
I want you to tell me...
how to get to the garage. Can we get to the garage from the house?
translation.it: come raggiungere il garage. Possiamo arrivarci da dentro la casa?

translation.en: I want you to follow my directions.
Okay? You just listen to what I tell you.
translation.it: Ok? Ascolta quello che ti dico.

translation.en: Hey, uh, left at the T-junction.
translation.it: Ehi, al bivio gira a sinistra.

translation.en: -Where are we going? -Just make a left.
translation.it: Dove andiamo? Tu gira a sinistra.

translation.en: Toss the keys back here slowly.
Just tell me what you want.
I can get you anything you want. Please, just tell me.
translation.it: Tutto quello che vuoi. Ti prego, dimmelo.

translation.en: No. 'Cause if I do, you'll shoot me.
I'm not asking you, I'm telling you. Get out of the truck.
translation.it: Non era una domanda. Scendi dall'auto.

translation.en: [tearfully] Why are you gonna kill me?
Just tell me what I've done so I know, please.
translation.it: Dimmi solo cosa ho fatto, ti prego.

translation.en: I can't help it because you're gonna kill me.
translation.it: Non posso farci niente. Vuoi uccidermi.

translation.en: Look, I need you to hold yourself together
and get out of the fucking truck, okay? You hear me?
translation.it: e scendi dall'auto. Mi hai sentita?

translation.en: Please, because, look, I know I've done some fucked up things in this lifetime.
translation.it: So di aver fatto delle cose orribili in questa vita.

translation.en: But please, if you tell me, I can fix it, I promise.
translation.it: Ma, se mi dici cosa, posso rimediare. Te lo giuro.

translation.en: Okay, listen to me, you piece of shit! I just want your fucking truck.
translation.it: Ascoltami, pezzo di merda! Voglio solo l'auto.

translation.en: [yells] Where are you, you piece of sh...
you gave it your best shot, Kat.
translation.it: hai fatto del tuo meglio, Kat.

translation.en: Stay there. That's good. Hold that.
translation.it: Resta lì. Mi piace. Sta' ferma.

translation.en: There has to be another way to put this right.
translation.it: Dev'esserci un altro modo per rimediare.

translation.en: You know what you gotta do.

translation.it: Quel che è giusto è giusto.

translation.en: I want you to know that I love you so, so, so much...
translation.it: voglio che tu sappia che ti voglio tanto bene...

translation.en: from the bottom of my heart.
none of this is gonna makes sense because it doesn't make any sense.
translation.it: niente di tutto questo avrà senso, perché non ce l'ha.

translation.en: But I want you to know that I didn't want to leave you.
translation.it: Voglio solo che tu sappia che non volevo lasciarti.

translation.en: And I had to do... I had to do...
I had to do what I had to do to keep you safe.
I want you to remember me.
translation.it: Voglio che ti ricordi di me.

translation.en: And keep me close to your heart as best as you can.
translation.it: Cerca di fare il possibile per tenermi vicina al tuo cuore.

translation.en: And, uh, don't let me fade.
I love you so, so, so much, sweetie.
You're gonna burn in hell for this.
You're gonna fucking burn, you fucking bitch.
You're gonna burn in hell for this! You'll burn!
This is Dr. Hayes. I'm calling about your daughter Clara.
translation.it: Sono il dott. Hayes. Chiamo per sua figlia.

translation.en: I've been trying you for around an hour now.
She's fine. She's up, ready to go. She's wondering where you are. [chuckles]
translation.it: Sta bene. Può essere dimessa. Si chiede dov'è sua madre.

translation.en: So am I, for that matter.
Tell her I'm on my way. I'll be there soon.
translation.it: Le dica che sto arrivando. Arrivo subito.

translation.en: Okay, will do. I'll make sure she gets something to eat.
[Clara] They gave me red jello and ice cream.
Ooh, they did, sweetie? Yeah, and spaghetti for dinner.
translation.it: - Davvero, tesoro? - Sì, e per cena gli spaghetti.

translation.en: When are we leaving? Do I have to stay in here?
translation.it: Quando ce ne andiamo? Devo restare qui?

translation.en: No, we don't. We're free to go now.

translation.it: Hai ragione, mamma, avrei dovuto richiamarti.

translation.en: I should have called you right back, but I just didn't want to bother you.
translation.it: Hai ragione, mamma, avrei dovuto richiamarti. Non volevo disturbarti. Ma ora stiamo partendo. Già.

translation.en: But we're hitting the road now, yeah.
translation.it: Non volevo disturbarti. Ma ora stiamo partendo. Già.

translation.en: No. Promise you, everything is all good.
translation.it: No. Te lo giuro, va tutto bene.

translation.en: [Clara] What letter are we up to?
What letter were we up to?
Where do you think he's going, Mommy?
[Clara] Your turn, Mommy. We're up to I.
translation.it: Tocca a te, mamma. Iniziamo dalla I.
